attributes.action: pay more attention to those with mental health issues
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Upto now i've lost four friends who were, i feel, let down by the mental health authority, 2 of whom were known to be suffering severe depression and yet released from mental hospitals even though their families still feared they posed a risk to themselves. consequently within 24 hour hours they had taken their own lives . i'm sure there are thousands of others who have suffered like i have and the families of my friends... i'm petitoning for the government to change the policy so that patients have a full psycho analysis before they are released back into the community and they receive community support until the relevant people see fit that they are discharged fully.... please help me to save lives!!
